headline: How Will Teradyne’s Recent 23.6% Rally Impact Its 2025 Valuation?
summary: If Teradyne has been on your radar lately, you are not alone. Investors everywhere are weighing whether now is the moment to buy, hold, or cash in. It is not hard to see why interest is swirling. Over the past month, the stock has jumped an impressive 23.6%, reclaiming ground after a modest 2.5% dip in the last week. Measured over the past year, Teradyne is up 11.6%. Over the last three years, shares have soared 95.3%. Those long-term holders have certainly been rewarded. The recent rally has...
